name: Night Hunt
description:
Three friends plan to hunt a local cryptid. Only some actual hunting may occur.

This is a very short story (probably around 5 minutes playtime) featuring some characters of mine based on gemstones. This was mostly an opportunity to learn how to make my first visual novel, so it's not super polished. That being said,  I'm generally happy with how it turned out and I'm excited to make more in the future!
